attributes.action: never attend the Bilderberg Group Conference.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bildberg Group is a secretive organisation of the most powerful people in the world. They meet annually and disclose nothing of what has been discussed.

It has been suggested that powerful figures in Britain have attended this conference.

The Prime Minister should make a public commitment to never attend this group. If he has in the past, this is the perfect time to admit it to the public and open up as to what was discussed.

This would go a long way to re-assuring citizens that the Prime Minister has a sincere desire to be honest and up-front in the face of secret organisations operating in this world.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
